name: Hidden Object: House Mysteries
description:
Our new hidden objects game Dark House Mysteries will be your new Photo puzzles game.

Are you ready for hidden object free mystery games and thrilling adventure for free? Our hidden object adventure journey is a must-have for all the Hidden Object game lovers!

Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across Dark House that draw you right into the heart of the mystery! Live out the exciting action, find clues and use your hidden object skill to reveal the truth behind crime, romance, relationships and even deeper mysteries.

Find hidden objects in pictures and have fun all day every day, cause this is the best hidden object searching game for adults and all the generations around the world.

Dark House Mysteries Hidden Object Adventure Game Free features:

– Hidden Object Adventure mystery game free!
– 2000 levels with mystery places hidden objects!
– Find the hidden object from the list below & click on it!
– Use pinch zoom feature to help you find the object!
– Use hints to help find difficult objects!

Join Dark House Mysteries and play the best puzzle hidden object games with 2000 levels.

Dark House Mysteries is free to download and play! Fun journey game hidden objects adventure!
